issue.message: The server URL currently uses a variable for the API version, 'v{{api-version-number}}', but the user explicitly requested the endpoint to be fixed to 'v1'.

repairs.action_taken: Updated the server URL to hardcode 'v1' in the path, changing it from 'https://{{your-n8n-instance-domain}}/api/v{{api-version-number}}' to 'https://{{your-n8n-instance-domain}}/api/v1'. Concurrently, the 'api-version-number' variable definition was removed from the server's variables as it is no longer used.
